#include<iostream>
#include<climits>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const ll lim=1e5;
ll dp[lim];
ll f(ll n){
    if(n<=1)return 0;
   if(n<lim){
        if(dp[n])
        return dp[n];
   }
    ll count=0;
    while(n!=1){
        if(n&1)count+=2;
        else count++;
        n/=2;
    }
    if(n<lim)dp[n]=count;
    //return dp[n];
    return count;
}
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(ll i=0;i<lim;i++)dp[i]=0;
    while(t--){
        ll n;
        //cout<<"om";
        cin>>n;
        //cout<<(n&(n-1))<<endl;
        if((n&(n-1))==0){
           // cout<<"om";
            cout<<f(n/2)<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        ll ans=LLONG_MAX;
        for(int i=1;i<n;i*=2){
            ll a=n&(i*2-1);
            ll temp=max(f(a),f(n-a));
            ans=min(ans,temp);
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;

    }
}
